rules_text:
Put a loyalty counter on Shinki, Creator Goddess for each Demon on the battlefield.
Create two 2/2 black Demon creature tokens with menace.
Each player chooses up to two lands they control and sacrifices the rest. Shinki, Creator Goddess deals 6 damage to each opponent and each non-Demon creature.
special_text:
[+2]: Choose a nonland card in your graveyard. Until end of turn, you may cast that card.
[0]: Create two 2/2 black Demon creature tokens with menace.
[-2]: Sacrifice a nonland permanent. Reveal cards from the top of your library until a nonland permanent card is revealed. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
[-12]: Each player chooses up to three lands they control and sacrifices the rest. Shinki deals 6 damage to each opponent and each non-Demon creature.
